participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, family-oriented, and introspective. Enjoys engaging in artistic projects and values time spent with loved ones.
participant_1.background: My days are filled with creating projects and keeping in touch with my family. I'm more of a homebody, but I do enjoy the occasional day out with my cats. I'm not really concerned with my appearance, I'm much more interested in creating and expressing myself. My neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me. I take walks with my mom and do yoga at home.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Determined yet struggling; has a contemporary outlook but is rooted in traditional family values. Enjoys eclectic music and is reflective about personal choices.
participant_2.background: I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills. I will not talk about my favorite food with others. While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic. I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods. I lie to my children about eating healthy.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing alright. Just hanging out at home today.
Nice! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to create projects, and I also enjoy spending time with my family and cats.
That sounds really fun! I like to watch rugby with my neighbor, and I take walks with my mom and do yoga at home.
That's great! I used to do yoga, but I haven't in a while.
Oh, you should definitely try it again! It's really good for you.
I know, I know. I need to get back into it.
Well, if you ever need a workout buddy, I'm always here!
Thanks, I'll keep that in mind!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom right now, but I'm looking for a job.
Oh, that's cool. I know how hard that can be.
Yeah, it's been a challenge, but I'm optimistic.
Well, I'm sure you'll find something soon!
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what's your favorite food?
Oh, I don't know if I can say that, haha.
Come on, don't be shy!
I don't like to talk about my favorite food because it's kind of weird.
Weird? How so?
I just don't think it's very normal.
Well, now I'm really curious. What is it?
It's pickled herring.
Pickled herring? That's not weird! I love pickled herring
